languages.text: {n}Маражай отвечает вам издевательским смехом.{/n} "По крайней мере ты дош{mf|ел|ла} до конца, {name}! Пусть крики умирающих слуг вечно звенят в твоем сознании — считай эту симфонию моим прощальным подарком тебе!"

{n}Marazhai responds with a jeering laugh.{/n} "At least you lasted until the end, {name}! May the screams of your dying servants ring in your ears forever — consider this symphony my parting gift to you!"
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай отвечает вам издевательским смехом.{/n} "По крайней мере ты дош{mf|ел|ла} до конца, {name}! Пусть крики умирающих слуг вечно звенят в твоем сознании — считай эту симфонию моим прощальным подарком тебе!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai responds with a jeering laugh.{/n} "At least you lasted until the end, {name}! May the screams of your dying servants ring in your ears forever — consider this symphony my parting gift to you!"

{n}Marazhai responds with a jeering laugh.{/n} "At least you lasted until the end, {name}! May the screams of your dying servants ring in your ears forever — consider this symphony my parting gift to you!"

{n}Marazhai responds with a jeering laugh.{/n} "At least you lasted until the end, {name}! May the screams of your dying servants ring in your ears forever — consider this symphony my parting gift to you!"

{n}Marazhai responds with a jeering laugh.{/n} "At least you lasted until the end, {name}! May the screams of your dying servants ring in your ears forever — consider this symphony my parting gift to you!"

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋发出了嘲弄的大笑声。{/n}“至少你坚持到了最后，{name}！愿你那些仆人临死前的尖叫永远在你耳边回响，就当这首交响乐是我送给你的临别赠礼吧！”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai responds with a jeering laugh.{/n} "At least you lasted until the end, {name}! May the screams of your dying servants ring in your ears forever — consider this symphony my parting gift to you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋发出了嘲弄的大笑声。{/n}“至少你坚持到了最后，{name}！愿你那些仆人临死前的尖叫永远在你耳边回响，就当这首交响乐是我送给你的临别赠礼吧！”

languages.text: {n}マラズハイが挑発するように笑って答える。{/n}「少なくとも、最後まで生き延びたな、{name}！死にゆく臣下どもの叫び声が、永遠にお前の耳に残ればいい…この交響曲を別れのプレゼントだと思ってくれ！」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai responds with a jeering laugh.{/n} "At least you lasted until the end, {name}! May the screams of your dying servants ring in your ears forever — consider this symphony my parting gift to you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイが挑発するように笑って答える。{/n}「少なくとも、最後まで生き延びたな、{name}！死にゆく臣下どもの叫び声が、永遠にお前の耳に残ればいい…この交響曲を別れのプレゼントだと思ってくれ！」

languages.text: {n}Marazhai responde con una risa burlona.{/n} «¡Por lo menos has aguantado hasta el final, {name}! Que los gritos de tus sirvientes moribundos resuenen por siempre en tus oídos... ¡considera esta sinfonía mi regalo de despedida!».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai responds with a jeering laugh.{/n} "At least you lasted until the end, {name}! May the screams of your dying servants ring in your ears forever — consider this symphony my parting gift to you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai responde con una risa burlona.{/n} «¡Por lo menos has aguantado hasta el final, {name}! Que los gritos de tus sirvientes moribundos resuenen por siempre en tus oídos... ¡considera esta sinfonía mi regalo de despedida!».

languages.text: {n}Marazhai lâche un rire moqueur.{/n} « Au moins, vous aurez tenu jusqu'au bout, {name} ! Puissent les hurlements de vos serviteurs mourants vous hanter jusqu'à la fin de vos jours ; considérez cette symphonie comme mon cadeau d'adieu ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai responds with a jeering laugh.{/n} "At least you lasted until the end, {name}! May the screams of your dying servants ring in your ears forever — consider this symphony my parting gift to you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai lâche un rire moqueur.{/n} « Au moins, vous aurez tenu jusqu'au bout, {name} ! Puissent les hurlements de vos serviteurs mourants vous hanter jusqu'à la fin de vos jours ; considérez cette symphonie comme mon cadeau d'adieu ! »

languages.text: {n}Marazhai lacht daraufhin höhnisch.{/n} "Wenigstens habt Ihr bis zum Ende durchgehalten, {name}! Mögen Euch die Schreie Eurer sterbenden Diener für immer in den Ohren liegen – betrachtet diese Sinfonie als mein Abschiedsgeschenk an Euch!"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai responds with a jeering laugh.{/n} "At least you lasted until the end, {name}! May the screams of your dying servants ring in your ears forever — consider this symphony my parting gift to you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai lacht daraufhin höhnisch.{/n} "Wenigstens habt Ihr bis zum Ende durchgehalten, {name}! Mögen Euch die Schreie Eurer sterbenden Diener für immer in den Ohren liegen – betrachtet diese Sinfonie als mein Abschiedsgeschenk an Euch!"

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, alaylı bir kahkahayla cevap veriyor.{/n} "En azından sonuna kadar dayandın {name}! Ölen hizmetkârlarının çığlıkları, kulaklarında ebediyen çınlasın. Bu senfoniyi sana veda armağanım olarak düşün!"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai responds with a jeering laugh.{/n} "At least you lasted until the end, {name}! May the screams of your dying servants ring in your ears forever — consider this symphony my parting gift to you!"
